message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.SE, cs.SI, cs.CE

The paper discusses the use of Building Management Systems (BMS) by building operators to manage various systems such as lighting, air conditioning, and security. The focus is on improving the user experience and management of BMS, which falls under the category of Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC). The paper also discusses the energy efficiency of buildings, which could fall under the category of Cybernetics (cs.CY). The study involves interviews with building operators, which could fall under the category of Software Engineering (cs.SE) or Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). Finally, the paper discusses design suggestions to improve the management of buildings, which could fall under the category of Computer Engineering (cs.CE).
